headline: Redwood Logistics Showcases OTM, WMS & GTM Integrations at Oracle OTM SIG 2025
summary: Redwood Logistics' integrated transportation, warehouse and global trade strategies are highlighted in customer presentations including Hormel Foods, Forward Air, and HWI.CHICAGO, June 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Redwood Logistics (Redwood), one of the fastest growing fourth party logistics (4PL) providers in North America, will present a series of speaking sessions at the Oracle Transportation Management Special Interest Group (OTM SIG) 2025 User Conference, taking place July 27–30 in Minneapo
